body.name: Dual Dash Cam 1080P, Dash Cam Front and Inside, Dash Camera for Cars with 32GB SD Card, Infrared Night Vision, 1.5 inch IPS Screen, Loop Recording, Accident Lock, WDR, Parking Monitor for Taxi Driver
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 1 hr 38 mins
features: 🎁【1080P DUAL DASH CAM】 - The dual dash cam M08 is equipped with a 1080P front and inside camera. Its wide angle, front (170°) and cabin (140°), allows you to have full monitoring inside and outside the car while driving the car. It's the reliable partner for daily commute, especially for taxi driving, road trips.

🎁【INFRARED NIGHT VISION & WDR】 - The inside camera is surrounded by 4 IR Led lights to get good night vision, which ensures clear recording inside the cabin even there is dark condition. The WDR (Wide Dynamic Range) feature automatically optimizes video quality for day/night recording.

🎁【LOOP RECORDING & ACCIDENT LOCK】 - When the SD card is full, the newly recorded videos will overwrite the oldest video. Built-in G-Sensor, when the car is hit, the video will be automatically locked and retained without being overwritten. Or you can, by pressing the lock button, lock and keep the video you want.

🎁【32GB CARD INCLUDED & POWERFUL FEATURES】 - The 32GB SD card is already inserted inside the dash cam. You don't need to prepare sd card. Turn on the dash cam, format the sd card and use it. The dual dash cam has more functions like Parking Monitor, Voice Recording, Screen Saver, Photo Function and so on.

🎁【EASY INSTALLATION & LIFETIME WARRANTY】- Mounting and cabling is also really easy. We added extra tools, crowbar and cable clips, to help you install the dual dash cam better and faster. We offer LIFETIME WARRANTY including professional after-sales team who respond 24/7 online. If there is any problem with the dual dash cam, please feel free to contact with us.
body.description: Take You into Safe Driving Why Choose DKK? We hope that our dash cam can provide an extra protection for your car. It can get you out of trouble when you need evidence.When you travel by car, it captures the scenery along the way for you.Whether it's design, functionality, accessories, we are committed to creating the highest quality dash cams. Our dash cam is not only easy to use, but also helps you to clearly record your driving situation and beautiful journey. Specification: Resolution: 1080P (Front)+1080P(Cabin) Display: 1.5''IPS Screen External power supply: DC 5V / 1.5A Internal Power:Built-in Li-ion Battery Lens: 170° (Front)+140°(Cabin)

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: NOTE: -32GB SD card is inserted in the camera. Please Format SD Card firstly: Find the option of “Format” in dashcam and click “OK” button. -Audio Recording: We suggest to use VLC media player to check the playback. The original player of your computer may not have the sound of playback. Or come to us to get the newest firmware. -Require Charging: Please always keep the camera plugged into the car's cigarette lighter. The internal battery has a small capacity and is used for backup power. - Screen Saver Function: To make the camera do not give any visual discomfort. The screen will go black but still recording after 1 minute by default. The flashing light means it is recording. If you want the screen on, just turn to menu and turn off "Screen Saver" function. -Not Wireless: The dash cam does not support an App to view playback. It supports viewing playback on the camera itself or computer. -Take Off Protective Film: Please take off the protective film of the lens and screen to ensure that the video is clearly displayed.

ALL IN ONE - Package Included 1 *Dash Cam Front & Inside1 *32GB SD Card1*11.48 ft Car Charger1 * 1.64 ft Mini USB Cable1 * Suction Cup1 * Crowbar4 * Cable Clips1 * User Manual Take You into Safe Driving Why Choose DKK? We hope that our dash cam can provide an extra protection for your car. It can get you out of trouble when you need evidence.When you travel by car, it captures the scenery along the way for you.Whether it's design, functionality, accessories, we are committed to creating the highest quality dash cams. Our dash cam is not only easy to use, but also helps you to clearly record your driving situation and beautiful journey. Specification: Resolution: 1080P (Front)+1080P(Cabin) Display: 1.5''IPS Screen External power supply: DC 5V / 1.5A Internal Power:Built-in Li-ion Battery Lens: 170° (Front)+140°(Cabin)

1080P Dual Dash Cam With an IPS screen, F2.0 aperture and advanced sensors, this FHD 1080P dual dash cam is ready for you to record inside and outside of your car, capturing clear images and details during the day and night. IR Night Vision When there is dark or no light inside the car, the dual dash cam will automatically turn on the four infrared lights around the interior camera to clearly record the image or videos inside the car. Loop Recording & G-sensor Lock The video will be recorded in a continuous loop, and when the memory card is full, the newest video will overwrite the oldest one. If an accident is detected, this dash cam will automatically lock and save the video immediately.

Ultra Wide Angle 170° wide angle lens (front) covers 3 lanes and records details in front of the car. 140° wide angle captures the condition of the inside of the car and your travel or daily commute, which sometimes can be used as evidence to settle disputes in necessary moments. Voice Recording The built-in microphone of this dual dash cam makes video playback less monotonous. Audio is also one of the important evidence when it comes to disputes. When needed, you can turn it on and off anytime. We suggest to use VLC media player to check the playback. Parking Monitor The parking monitor function is good for monitoring your car when it is parked. When the dual dash cam detects a collision, it will automatically turn on to record and save the videos. (Additional hardware kit required if you want 24H to monitor).

Q05 M08 Camera Type Front and Rear Front and Inside Screen Size 2.45 Inch 1.5 Inch Video Resolution Front: 1080P Rear:720P Front:1080P Interior:1080P 32GB SD Card Included Included Lens Angle Front: 170° Rear: 140° Front: 170° Interior:140° IR Night Vision N/A Interior Camera Voice Recording ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Little More Peace of Mind While Driving
reviews.reviewText: There's a bit of a feeling of more security while driving. Not too happy with some of the lawlessness going on on the Florida roads. Just makes me feel better knowing that if I am involved in an accident, at least I'll know who to blame, even if it is me!Great quality for the price I paid, and easy enough to install and keep the wires out-of-sight.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cheap and reliable

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Works well, easy to setup, and most importantly gets the job done!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic camera for the price
reviews.reviewText: I rated the camera 5 stars. I received a camera and found that it did not work when it was attached to the car or usb port on my computer. I corresponded via e-mail with the company and they were able through videos provided and explanation of what I had tried it was determined the camera was faulty. They immediately sent a new camera to replace the original. Upon receiving the new camera is worked great. It was very easy to set up and operate. The picture quality is fantastic and I am thinking about getting a send camera for our other car. Would definitely recommend to a friend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good dash cam
reviews.reviewText: This dash cam is so awesome I ordered another one for my other vehicle. Sound and video quality is so clear. Dual cam covering front and back is really helpful. Battery needs extended power.. seller is very accomodating. 5 star for service. Compact size does not block view, records clear video. Useful features like locking important video segment. Dual face camera to record both front and back.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This camera works great and it was very easy to install. The extra wire was great because we had plenty of room to hide it in the truck. Would purchase another if I needed to.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Camera will not loop record
reviews.reviewText: Camera will not loop record. Tried several sd cards with no luck.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice quality and great for the price.‹
reviews.reviewText: I installed this camera on my car, and it worked perfectly as described. The screen is a bit smaller than I would like but the design is sturdy and somehow compact. won't block your front view, the picture quality is also good.
